dct_title_s: Palestine of the Old Testament / compiled, drawn & printed under the direction of F.J. Salmon.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints. Includes inset map showing southern Palestine. "The border decoration is from the ivories found in the ruins of Ahab's palace at Samaria. The seals, which are from a variety of sources, are as follows: N.W. corner - Hananiah, son of Achbor, N.E. corner - Shema, servant of Jeroboam, S.W. corner - Nethaniah, son of Obadiah, S.E. corner - Jezaniah." "Transliteration is according to the authorize version of the Bible in English." "Some of the identifications are controversial."
